intro.title: CONFINED SINCE WHEN ?
intro.subtitle: For COVID19
intro.text:
The world is currently experiencing a global pandemic : COVID-19 disease, caused by Coronavirus. To stop the spread of the virus, many countries have set up containment of their population.
This site presents a non-exhaustive list of these countries and the duration since containment has been implemented in them.

site_data_message: The data on this site is updated manually and does not guarantee to be exact. It's based on news from around the world.

meta.title: How long have we been confined ? - COVID 19 - Coronavirus
meta.description: A site that tells you just how long you've been confined. (If you too are not sure anymore)
meta.keywords: coronavirus, corona, confinement, quarantaine, covid, covid19, 2020, confinement 2020, combien, jours, heurs, combien de jours confinement, how long confinement, confinement coronavirus, confinement covid, confinenement covid19, confinés, depuis quand confinés, depuis combien de temps confinement, combien de jours confinement, nombre de jours confinement, how many time
